## ValidProviderInput type

A valid "ethers" Provider, Signer or a Network object or url address to create a Provider with.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ValidProviderInput = ProviderOrSigner | Network | string;
```

<b>References:</b> [ProviderOrSigner](./sdk.providerorsigner.md)
